item.title: Helping
item.description: Hello friends. The next Luzerner Spieltage are just around the corner. And we need you for that! Please contact us today and let us know your dream job. Of course we try to meet your wishes, but we are happy if you are flexible. Our goal is to keep the duration of the shifts as short as possible. The Spieltage last as follows: Saturday, 7 March 2020, 10 a.m. to midnight Sunday, 8 March 2020, 10 a.
